newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY TO SELL TOBACCO FERMENTING COMPANY.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY TO SELL TOBACCO FERMENTING COMPANY.

text.p: Hungary's state privatisation agency APV Rt said on Wednesday it will offer a 77.5 percent stake, representing a nominal value of 799.3 million forints, in tobacco fermenting company Dohanyfermentalo Rt.
APV will try to find a strategic investor for 75 percent plus one share, it said in a statement.
Thirty percent of the purchase price, but at least 60 million forints, is to be paid by cash in one instalment, while the rest can be paid with compensation coupons , it said.
Investors with more than a five percent stake in the Hungarian tobacco product manufacturing may not participate, it said.
